description: Register an SAP application with AWS Systems Manager for SAP. You must meet the following requirements before registering. The SAP application you want to register with AWS Systems Manager for SAP is running on Amazon EC2. AWS Systems Manager Agent must be setup on an Amazon EC2 instance along with the required IAM permissions. Amazon EC2 instance(s) must have access to the secrets created in AWS Secrets Manager to manage SAP applications and components.

parameters.name: Instances
parameters.description: The Amazon EC2 instances on which your SAP application is running. (string) ---

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be attached to the SAP application. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: Credentials
parameters.description: The credentials of the SAP application. (dict) --- The credentials of your SAP application. The name of the SAP HANA database. The type of the application credentials. The secret ID created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the credentials of the SAP application.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The name of the SAP HANA database.

nested_params.name: CredentialType
nested_params.description: The type of the application credentials.

nested_params.name: SecretId
nested_params.description: The secret ID created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the credentials of the SAP application.

parameters.name: ComponentsInfo
parameters.description: This is an optional parameter for component details to which the SAP ABAP application is attached, such as Web Dispatcher. This is an array of ApplicationComponent objects. You may input 0 to 5 items. (dict) --- This is information about the component of your SAP application, such as Web Dispatcher. This string is the type of the component. Accepted value is WD. This string is the SAP System ID of the component. Accepted values are alphanumeric. This is the Amazon EC2 instance on which your SAP component is running. Accepted values are alphanumeric.

nested_params.name: ComponentType
nested_params.description: This string is the type of the component. Accepted value is WD.

nested_params.name: Sid
nested_params.description: This string is the SAP System ID of the component. Accepted values are alphanumeric.

nested_params.name: Ec2InstanceId
nested_params.description: This is the Amazon EC2 instance on which your SAP component is running. Accepted values are alphanumeric.

nested_items.name: Application
nested_items.description: The application registered with AWS Systems Manager for SAP.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

nested_items.name: AppRegistryArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Application Registry.

nested_items.name: DiscoveryStatus
nested_items.description: The latest discovery result for the application.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time at which the application was last updated.

nested_items.name: AssociatedApplicationArns
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Names of the associated AWS Systems Manager for SAP applications.
